stimulusHtml: How many times will the statement in line 5 be executed as a result of running this code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

Â 

for (int outer = 0; outer < 5; outer++)
{
   for (int inner = 4; inner >= 0; inner--)
   {
      System.out.println("*");               // Line 5
   }
}
